{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=c++17 | num=1 | 1=
directory_entry&amp; operator=( const directory_entry&amp; other ) = default;
}}
{{dcl | since=c++17 | num=2 | 1=
directory_entry&amp; operator=( directory_entry&amp;&amp; other ) noexcept = default;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Replaces the contents of the directory entry (path and cached attributes, if any) with the contents of {{tt|other}}.

Both copy- and move-assignment operators for {{tt|directory_entry}} are defaulted.
